Two rules that I swear by in my apartment are: Never turn on the big light and always have a candle ready to burn in the evenings. Both of these steps go a long way in creating a warm and cozy vibe in my space, especially during the winter. As a result, I’ve accumulated a collection of adorable lamps — four of them are scattered around my tiny studio — and I have at least 10 candles stocked up so that I never have to go without one. (My latest fave is Apotheke’s Charcoal Rouge, if you’re in need of a new scent for the season. Thank me later!)

As much as a stickler as I am for my rules, I still have yet to jump on the candle warmer trend, even though I’ve seen them all over TikTok and been tempted more than once. It incorporates two of my favorite home items, after all! I was waiting to splurge because most of the ones I saw didn’t quite gel with the rest of my vintage-style decor. However, I think that I’ve finally found the perfect one, and the price is right. This $26 candle warmer looks just like an antique flower lamp. Read on to find out the other reasons why — beyond its good looks — thousands of Amazon shoppers bought it last month.

What is the Funistree Flower Candle Warmer Lamp?

I could go on and on about how stunning the glass shade of this candle warmer lamp is, with intricate details to make it truly resemble a flower. The golden “stem” is just the cherry on top, adding to the organic feel with its curved shape. When you switch on the light, the warm glow adds to the romantic feel. It has four brightness levels, ranging from 10% to 100%, and it’ll melt your candle in minutes. You can place even a large three-wick candle on its wooden base.

Candle warmers are already safer than going the traditional route and lighting the wicks, but this one is even more so because it runs on a timer. With its two-, four-, and eight-hour settings, you can set it up so it turns off automatically when you fall asleep.

What Amazon Shoppers Are Saying

“Loving it so far!! Looks so cute straight out of the box. I love how it functions both as a candle warmer and a lamp. The dimmer is also amazing to control the brightness. Definitely will buy more for around the house!” — Padam

“So cute and adds a vintagey, dainty warmth to any room. Pic does not do it justice. Fits a bath and body works candle perfectly. I would say it doesn’t give off as strong a scent as burning a candle but it’s enough that it’s noticeable and is safer and makes the candle last longer.” — Amazon Customer

“This is a super cute, vintage looking candle warming light. I love the timer function on it which is unique compared to most others.” — Darlene Kuhn

Until mid-December, you can apply an extra 10% coupon to score it at an even lower price. This candle warmer is going straight onto my Christmas list — but I’ll probably end up buying it for myself so I can make the most out of the winter months. I can’t wait!
